Uses of Interface
imagingbook.spectral.dft.Dft1d.Double

  • Packages that use Dft1d.Double 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.spectral.dft
    Defines 1D and 2D implementations of the Discrete Fourier Transform.

    • Uses of Dft1d.Double in imagingbook.spectral.dft

      Classes in imagingbook.spectral.dft that implement Dft1d.Double 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Dft1dDirect.Double
      One-dimensional DFT implementation using double data.
      static class  Dft1dFast.Double
      One-dimensional FFT implementation using double data.
